title: Mathematical Problem-Solving Project Utilizing Storytelling and Role-Playing

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic algebra and geometry concepts, and data analysis skills
context.additional_context: Utilizing smartphone-based LMS, implementing weekly missions and peer evaluation systems.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately perform mathematical modeling processes in storytelling-based problem scenarios with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can successfully solve physics-mathematics integrated problems three or more times through role-play game-based collaboration.
Learners can submit project outcomes as digital portfolios and demonstrate the ability to provide logical justifications.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
